name: Austin Lanier
title: Mobile Developer
about:
I'm a graduate of the UNC Chapel Hill CS program and an Android Developer here at Smashing Boxes. I have a strong desire to continue learning, and bettering myself in everything that I do. I enjoy problem solving and working with clients/team members to see products take shape. 

I've worked on a variety of different projects here at Smashing Boxes, from the Bevii social media application to the surf forecasting application that I'm currently working on. I've also been fortunate enough to play around with Google Glass development. 

Some of my personal interests include watching movies and sports, traveling, hanging out with friends, and going out on weekends. I also enjoy playing pool, volleyball, baseball, or just about anything if it's warm out. I'm also interested in learning new programming languages, following new technologies, and have started building computers in my free-time.
